name: 黑铁笼 Cage Darkness Beetle 漆黒の甲虫 囚人籠
name_original: 黑铁笼 Cage Darkness Beetle 漆黒の甲虫 囚人籠
description:
Amazing and epic adventures await you!

This is a huge world precipitated and designed by Sin.Alfred.Huang over 20 years!
From the great epic of the Cambrian to the Cretaceous, you can follow along with the rumored Black Beetle mercenaries to learn all about it.
Such as the perpetual winter, when the tide came and they had to live on the bottom of the sea. Burning all the nine hot sun, the earth a barren era.

Challenging 2D ARPG!

Step by step through the difficulty of play, constantly challenge more powerful monsters, make more beautiful and powerful equipment.

Rich and diverse weapon systems!

There are more than two dozen weapons with different gameplay, and each weapon type feels like a fresh start.

Constantly updated play content!

Constantly updating the game to add content to the game, even if it stops updating years later, is amazing!
